short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean new tab to boost focus and productivity with quick tools, daily inspiration, and a playful touch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you a simple yet beautiful New Tab page, designed to keep you focused and motivated.

Features:
✨ Clean Interface: Start your day with a calm and distraction-free layout that helps you stay focused on what matters.
✨ Quick Productivity Links: Get instant access to your email, calendar, and cloud storage (Google Drive, OneDrive, etc.) without wasting time.
✨ Daily Motivation: A fresh, inspirational quote every day to keep you motivated and on track.
✨ Accent Colors: Personalize your experience by choosing from a range of accent colors to match your style and mood.
✨ Essential Links: Access a handpicked selection of useful websites that help boost productivity and creativity. (Some links may be affiliate links, and "Sponsored/Promoted/Featured" will be mentioned if they are.)
✨ Interactive Cat Companion: Meet Oneko, a playful on-screen cat that adds a touch of fun and lightheartedness to your workday.

Need help or have a feature request?
Feel free to reach out—I'm always open to suggestions and happy to assist!
